# 1.
```{r}
data("knz_bison")

bison <- knz_bison %>% 
  mutate(animal_age = rec_year - animal_yob)

```
# 2.
```{r}
weight.threshold = 1000
bison.weight <- filter(bison, animal_weight > weight.threshold)
```

#3
```{r}
boxplot(animal_weight~ animal_sex, data = bison)
t.test(animal_weight~animal_sex, data = bison)
#Weight is significantly different between sexes

```
